name: Douglas Comer
content: Douglas E. Comer Douglas E. Comer Primary Address: Computer Science Department Purdue University 305 N. University Street West Lafayette, IN 47907-2066 comer at purdue dot edu Titles: Distinguished Professor of Computer Science author, lecturer, and consultant Information is available about: Books Comer has written on the topics: Networks and Internets (TCP/IP Protocols) Cloud Computing, Computer Architecture, and Operating Systems (Xinu) Foreign language editions of books Professional seminars and tutorials Comer teaches at conferences and on-site Consulting Courses taught at Purdue University Research projects and software systems A few essays about Computer Science For anyone considering a Ph.D. in Computer Science How to write a Ph.D. dissertation Ways to obtain tenure in a university How to escape during a Ph.D. Final Exam An explanation of language used in CS Departments How to generate a CS research topic How to insult a Computer Scientist How to stump students on an oral qualifier Everything is broken: an easy path to research How to measure research How the 7-layer reference model was invented The Identity Crisis In Computer Science Information from Comer's publishers Prentice Hall (book publisher) CRC Press (book publisher)
